code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=props=>{const{onLogin,showToast}=props;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const auth=useAuth();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');try{await auth.login(email,password);if(onLogin)onLogin(auth.user);if(typeof showToast==='function')showToast('Successfully logged in!');navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-ui-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-ui-card",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-ui-title",children:"Sign In"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-ui-error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"login-ui-input",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"login-ui-input",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-ui-button",type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-ui-switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Don't have an account?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"login-ui-button",style:{marginTop:0,marginLeft:'0.5rem',background:'#e0e7ff',color:'#4f8cff'},onClick:()=>navigate('/signin'),children:"Sign Up"})]})]})});};export default Login;
